程序包 com.academic_assistant.controller

类 ChatController

java.lang.Object
com.academic_assistant.controller.ChatController
@RestController @RequestMapping("/messages") public class ChatController extends Object
This class serves as the controller for managing chat messages within the system. It handles HTTP requests related to chat messages, such as retrieving chat history between users, creating chat relationships between users, and retrieving chat partners for a user.

    Constructs a new ChatController with the specified ChatService.

  • 构造器详细资料

    • ChatController

      @Autowired public ChatController(ChatService chatService)
      Constructs a new ChatController with the specified ChatService.
      参数:
      chatService - The ChatService to be used by the controller.

  • 方法详细资料

    • getChatUsers

      @CrossOrigin @GetMapping("/user/{userId}") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<?> getChatUsers(@PathVariable Integer userId)
      Retrieves all users with whom a specified user has had a chat.
      参数:
      userId - The ID of the user for whom chat partners are to be retrieved.
      返回:
      A list of User objects representing chat partners.

    • getUserHistoryMessages

      @CrossOrigin @GetMapping("/history/{userId1}/{userId2}") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<?> getUserHistoryMessages(@PathVariable Integer userId1, @PathVariable Integer userId2)
      Retrieves all chat messages between two specified users.
      参数:
      userId1 - The ID of the first user.
      userId2 - The ID of the second user.
      返回:
      A list of ChatMessage objects representing chat messages between the two users.

    • createChatRelationship

      @CrossOrigin @PostMapping("/createRelationship/{userId1}/{userId2}") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<?> createChatRelationship(@PathVariable Integer userId1, @PathVariable Integer userId2)
      Creates a chat relationship between two specified users.
      参数:
      userId1 - The ID of the first user.
      userId2 - The ID of the second user.
      返回:
      A ResponseEntity indicating the success or failure of the chat relationship creation.
